meta.name: Automate Job Searching & Resume Customization with Mistral AI, LinkedIn & Google Sheets

parameters.message:
=

Â  Dear Job Seeker,

Â  This daily digest summarizes the results of your automated job search. The Top 5 job matches found in today's run are detailed below, with comprehensive analysis available in your tracking sheet.

Â 

Â  Â  ğŸ† Top 5 Job Matches Â 

Â  {{ $json.data.map((item, index) => { Â  Â  // Safely replace newlines in Improvements Â  Â  const improvements = item.Improvements ? item.Improvements.replace(/ /g, '
').replace(/"/g, '"') : 'N/A'; Â  Â  Â  Â  // Choose alternating background color Â  Â  const bgColor = index % 2 === 0 ? '#f4f4f4' : '#ffffff'; Â  Â  Â  Â  // Determine score color for visual emphasis Â  Â  const score = parseInt(item.Score) || 0; Â  Â  const scoreColor = score >= 80 ? 'green' : (score >= 60 ? 'orange' : 'red'); Â  Â  // Extract the first improvement point Â  Â  const topImprovement = improvements.split('
')[0] || 'No specific top improvement listed.'; Â  Â  return ` Â  Â  Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â 

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ${index + 1}. ${item.Title} @ ${item.Company} Â  Â  Â  Â 

Â  Â  Â  Â 

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Match Score: ${item.Score}/100 Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  | Location: ${item.Location} Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  | Salary: ${item['Salary '] || 'N/A'} Â  Â  Â  Â 

Â  Â  Â  Â 

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  [View Job & Apply] Â  Â  Â  Â 

Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 
Top Resume Improvement Action:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  ${topImprovement} Â  Â  Â  Â 
Â  Â  Â 
Â  Â  `; Â  }).join('') }}

Â  Access the full, filterable list and detailed notes for all jobs (including full cover letters, red flags, and more) here:
Â  Â  Â  ğŸš€ Open Job Search Tracking Sheet Â 

Â  Best of luck with your job search!
parameters.subject: Job Match Results

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
	"keyword": "Maintenance Manager",
	"location": "Los Angeles",
	"experiencelevel": "Mid-Senior Level",
	"remote": "No",
	"alternatekeyword": "Engineering Manager",
	"alternatekeyword1": "Engineering Manager",
	"alternatekeyword2": "Engineering Manager"

}

parameters.text:
=You are a resume review AI Agent.

Use {{ $json.text }} to provide the following outputs;
-Keyword, main job title.Â  Pick the top single job title based on this resume.Â  This must not include the word "and".Â  Focus on the industry or job area relevant in the resume.
-Alternate Keyword, list other possible job titles.Â  Only list the top 3. This must not include the word "and". 
-Location of Job Desired, if no desired location is provided use the current address city.
-Experience Level, Pick one of the following Internship, Entry Level, Associate, Mid-Senior Level, Director, Executive
-Remote, Choose one, On-Site, Hybrid, Remote.Â  If not specified respond "On-Site".

=You are a precise job-matching and content generation expert. Your task is to analyze a resume against a job description, compute a match score, provide actionable feedback, and draft a cover letter.

Return **EXACTLY ONE JSON** object wrapped in ```json fences, followed by the line END_OF_JSON. Do NOT include any introductory or concluding prose.

INPUT DATA
job_description: {{ $json.Description }}
my_resume: {{ $('Extract from Resume1').item.json.text }}

TASKS
1) JOB ANALYSIS: Extract and structure the following data from the job_description.
2) RESUME ANALYSIS: Extract and structure the following data from the my_resume.
3) MATCH SCORING (integer 0â€“100): Calculate the score based on the weighted categories provided below. Deduct up to 10 points for issues listed in red_flags.
Â  Â  - Skills/Tools overlap: 40 points
Â  Â  - Relevant experience & seniority: 25 points
Â  Â  - Responsibilities alignment: 15 points
Â  Â  - Education/Certs fit: 10 points
Â  Â  - Domain/industry fit: 5 points
Â  Â  - Logistics (location/work auth/availability): 5 points
4) SCORE EXPLANATION: For each category, provide 1â€“3 *concise* evidence bullets. Quote short, relevant fragments (escape quotes) and cite "JD" or "Resume".
5) GAPS & SUGGESTIONS: Identify missing/weak requirements and list 1â€“2 concrete upskilling steps for each.
6) COVER LETTER: Generate a professional, highly-tailored cover letter (150â€“220 words, 2â€“4 paragraphs). Focus on concrete impacts. **Must use JSON-safe formatting:** escape all double quotes as " and use 
 for newlines. Omit greeting and signature.

STRICT FORMATTING RULES
- All array elements must be **short phrases (â‰¤ 140 characters)**, single line, with NO markdown, line breaks, asterisks, or list indicators. Summarize long paragraphs.
- Ensure all key-value pairs adhere strictly to the schema below.

SCHEMA
```json
{
Â  "job_analysis": {
Â  Â  "title": "",
Â  Â  "company": "",
Â  Â  "must_have_skills": [],
Â  Â  "nice_to_have_skills": [],
Â  Â  "responsibilities": [],
Â  Â  "years_of_experience": "",
Â  Â  "education_certifications": "",
Â  Â  "location_constraints": "",
Â  Â  "domain_industry_focus": "",
Â  Â  "tech_stack": [],
Â  Â  "measurable_kpis": [],
Â  Â  "relocation_requirement": ""
Â  },
Â  "resume_analysis": {
Â  Â  "core_skills": [],
Â  Â  "tools_tech": {
Â  Â  Â  "programming_languages": [],
Â  Â  Â  "frontend_technologies": [],
Â  Â  Â  "backend_technologies": [],
Â  Â  Â  "databases_devops": []
Â  Â  },
Â  Â  "years_of_experience_key_areas": {},
Â  Â  "accomplishments_with_metrics": [],
Â  Â  "education_certs": [],
Â  Â  "domains": [],
Â  Â  "roles_titles": [],
Â  Â  "leadership_collaboration": [],
Â  Â  "location_work_auth": ""
Â  },
Â  "match_score": 0,
Â  "score_explanation": [
Â  Â  { "category": "Skills/Tools overlap (40 points)", "score": 0, "evidence": [] },
Â  Â  { "category": "Relevant experience depth & seniority (25 points)", "score": 0, "evidence": [] },
Â  Â  { "category": "Responsibilities alignment (15 points)", "score": 0, "evidence": [] },
Â  Â  { "category": "Education/Certs fit (10 points)", "score": 0, "evidence": [] },
Â  Â  { "category": "Domain/industry fit (5 points)", "score": 0, "evidence": [] },
Â  Â  { "category": "Logistics (location, work auth, availability) (5 points)", "score": 0, "evidence": [] }
Â  ],
Â  "red_flags": [],
Â  "gaps_and_suggestions": [
Â  Â  { "gap": "", "suggestion": "" }
Â  ],
Â  "cover_letter": ""
}

=You are a ruthless resume editor. Your sole output must be a crisp, numbered list of actionable resume changes to maximize job fit.

Inputs:

job_description: {{ $json.Description }}

my_resume: {{ $('Extract from Resume1').item.json.text }}

STRICT OUTPUT RULES:

Output a numbered list only; start with the highest-impact change.

Each point must be a single line of 14 words or less.

Each line must start with one of the following tags: [ADD], [REMOVE], [REWRITE], [ORDER], [QUANTIFY], [KEYWORDS], [FORMAT], [FOCUS].

All points must be based on genuine gaps against the job_description. Do not invent experience.

Include a final, single line for keywords: 'Missing keywords: term1, term2, ...' (list only if any).

No intros, explanations, code fences, bullet points, or any extra text.

nodes.name: Append or update row in Job Search1

parameters.content:
## Update

Provide your resume by updating the URL in the Download Resume node.

## Update

Link Google Sheets to your Job Search data base.

## Create

Create a Google Sheet with the columns listed in this node.

## Update
Give your email a personal touch.Â  Change colors, font, spacing, and more.Â  

Tip: If you are not good with HTML, give the HTML in this node to AI and let it format for you.
Only focussing on the top 5 results.Â  If you want to see more results per email, change the Limit node to your desired output.

Job scraping is acheived using the 4 key job titles that match your resume.Â  \n\nTip:Â  For the first run it might be beneficial to search all jobs.Â  Remove "r86400" to list all jobs available.Â  Add "r86400" back in after theÂ  first successful run to only search past 24 hours.

# Description

This advanced workflow automates the entire job search and preparation process, moving beyond simple notifications to provide AI-driven career intelligence.

It connects to LinkedIn to scrape fresh job postings, filters against jobs youâ€™ve already seen, and then uses powerful LLMs (Mistral Large/Small) to perform a detailed resume-to-job match, generate tailored cover letters, and provide concrete resume improvement suggestions. All data is logged into a Google Sheet for comprehensive tracking, and a clean, single Daily Digest Email summarizes the top 5 matches found each day.
Want a personal touch?Â  Review the AI prompts to give personal guidance.Â

main.node: Append or update row in Job Search1
